Details.Textbox24: EMWD provides domestic and agricultural water, wastewater collection and treatment service, and recycled water in a 555 square mile area with a population of approximately 700,000 in western Riverside County.
Details.Textbox73: Reporting Protocol: General Reporting Protocol 2.1 and associated updates and clarifications
Details.Textbox108: Verification Body: Ruby Canyon Engineering Inc.
